Module: sfx

Sound effects API. Uses Web Audio API for sound effects and HTML5 audio for background music.
Source:
  • ext/sfx.js, line 3

Methods

(static) apply_playlist(objs, delay, random)

Apply the new playlist from the given set of speakers. The new playlist starts playing immediately.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
objs Array Array of object IDs
delay Number Number of seconds between tracks
random Boolean Randomize playback sequence
Source:
  • ext/sfx.js, line 254

(static) clear_playlist()

Stop playback and clear the playlist.
Source:
  • ext/sfx.js, line 263

Set cyclic flag.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
obj Speaker object ID

Source:

(static) duck(obj, value, time)

Duck (reduce the volume). works independently from the volume API and the volume randomization
Parameters:
Name Type Description
obj Object Object ID
value Number Duck amount.
time Number Time to change volume.

    • ext/sfx.js, line 157

    (static) speaker_play(obj, cyclic, durationopt, playrateopt)

    Play sound through the speaker.

    cyclic = true - loop forever, ignore required duration

    cyclic = false - use duration param:

    • required duration >= sample duration: expand sample by looping
    • required duration < sample duration: allow to play whole sample duration (do not trim)
    Parameters:
    Name Type Attributes Default Description
    obj Object Object ID
    cyclic Boolean
    duration Number <optional>
    		 0 Duration in float seconds
    playrate Number <optional>
    		 1 Playback rate
    Deprecated:
    • Use play() or play_def()
      Source:
      • ext/sfx.js, line 42

      (static) speaker_playback_rate()

      Change the speaker playback rate value
      Deprecated:
      • Use playrate()
        Source:
        • ext/sfx.js, line 87

        (static) speaker_reset_speed(obj)

        Reset the speaker speed. It's necessary to nullify speed after the speaker has moved quickly in order to neutralize the undesirable doppler effect.
        Parameters:
        Name Type Description
        obj Speaker object ID
        Source:
        • ext/sfx.js, line 134
